abstract: Afghan National Army soldier opens fire at base in Paktika Province, killing two American soldiers and one American civilian; one Italian soldier is killed and two others are wounded in separate attack in Farah Province.

byline.contributor: Farooq Jan Mangal contributed reporting from Khost, Afghanistan, and Taimoor Shah from Kandahar, Afghanistan.

lead_paragraph: In one attack, an Afghan soldier opened fire on international troops serving with him in eastern Afghanistan, officials said, killing two American soldiers and a civilian. In the second attack, an Italian soldier was killed when a grenade was thrown at him.

headline.seo: 3 Americans and Italian Soldier Killed in Afghanistan
headline.main: 3 Americans and an Italian Killed in Afghan Attacks
